name: Massage Salon Story: Spring Breeze
description:
Many years after graduation, a chance opportunity bring you back to your hometown and you start running a massage salon.
Customers of all personalities are waiting for you here.
You can tempt your customers with different massage techniques and positions to satisfy their desires.
Of course, it is important to work hard to earn money.
If the decorating standards of the store are too low or the reputation is too bad, the massage salon will have fewer customers.
Work hard and enjoy the life!

USP

Old school simulation
  • Satisfying customers in order to get paid.
  • Renovate the salon to enhance customer comfort.
  • Create your own brand of massage.

The whole massage is a new interactive experience, with each massage movement created using Spine animation technology.
Take the opportunity to try a bolder gesture!



The introverted college girl. A childhood neighbor has not seen each other for many years. Do you remember the promise?


The miko of the shrine in the small town. She is busy with the affairs of the shrine every day. Can you let her get relaxed physically and mentally?


She was once a sister who took care of me in every way. She lost her husband shortly after their marriage a few years ago. Will you be able to comfort her?
